dict.acceptation: 厕所，洗手间；马桶；梳洗，打扮；清洗伤口；

sent.orig: In British English the toilet in private houses is called the lavatory, toilet, WC(dated), or loo(informal)
sent.trans: 在英式英语中，私人住宅中的厕所称为thelavatory,toilet,WC（已陈旧）或loo（用于口语）。

sent.orig: The toilet is for toilet paper and toilet paper only!
sent.trans: 在厕所里用卫生纸而且只能用卫生纸！

sent.orig: Toilet. This is also necessary to cure suffering – you are to go to the toilet.
sent.trans: 上厕所。这对治苦而言是必要的，你不得不上厕所。

sent.orig: First, Dave lifts both lids of the toilet, and adds some shampoo to the toilet water.
sent.trans: 戴维首先打开马桶的两个厕盖，并往马桶里加了些洗发水。

sent.orig: The toilet paper is in the case of the toilet, so you can easily reach it.
sent.trans: 卫生纸就放在卫生间的盒子里，伸手就能拿到。
